Package dev.kkorolyov.simpleopts

Class Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.simpleopts.Option

  • public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    A single command line option. Any single Option has
    • shortName - a single character preceded by '-' which uniquely identifies the option, (e.g., -o)
    • longName - a word or phrase preceded by '--' which serves as the name of the option, (e.g., --option)
    • description - a short description of the option, (e.g., Changes value 'x')
    • requiresArg - a boolean specifying whether the option depends on an additional argument

    • Constructor Detail

      • Option

        public Option​(java.lang.String shortName,
              java.lang.String longName,
              java.lang.String description,
              boolean requiresArg)
        Constructs a new option using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        shortName - a unique, single-character identifier of this option; if null, this option will not have a short name
        longName - full identifier of this option
        description - descriptive statement about this option
        requiresArg - if true, this option requires a specified argument declared directly after it

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
